Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Applicant
entity.HDBOfficer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class HDBOfficer extends Applicant
Represents an HDB officer user in the BTO Management System. Extends the Applicant class with officer-specific functionality.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBOfficer

      public HDBOfficer(String nric, String name, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Creates a new HDB Officer with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the officer
      name - The name of the officer
      password - The password of the officer
      age - The age of the officer
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the officer

  • Method Details

    • getHandlingProjectName

      public String getHandlingProjectName()
      Gets the name of the project this officer is handling.
      Returns:
      The project name, or null if not handling any project

    • setHandlingProjectName

      public void setHandlingProjectName(String projectName)
      Sets the name of the project this officer is handling.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The new project name, or null to clear

    • isHandlingProject

      public boolean isHandlingProject()
      Checks if this officer is handling a project.
      Returns:
      true if the officer is handling a project, false otherwise

    • clearHandlingProject

      public void clearHandlingProject()
      Clears the project this officer is handling.
